```{r}
library(httr)
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
library(geniusr)
```



```{r}

library(rvest)


url <- "https://www.shazam.com/song/1524860628/wunna"


page <- read_html(url)


lyrics_div <- page %>%
  html_elements(".Text-module_text-gray-900__Qcj0F") %>%
  html_text()
x <- as.data.frame(lyrics_div)


max_length_index <- which.max(nchar(x$lyrics_div))


longest_lyrics <- x[max_length_index, "lyrics_div"]


longest_lyrics_df <- data.frame(lyrics = longest_lyrics, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)


print(longest_lyrics_df)

longest_lyrics_df$song = "Wunna"
longest_lyrics_df$artist = "Gunna"



```

```{r}

url <- "https://www.shazam.com/en-us/song/1437955726/drip-too-hard"


page <- read_html(url)


lyrics_div <- page %>%
  html_elements(".Text-module_text-gray-900__Qcj0F") %>%
  html_text()
x <- as.data.frame(lyrics_div)

max_length_index <- which.max(nchar(x$lyrics_div))


longest_lyrics <- x[max_length_index, "lyrics_div"]

longest_lyrics


new_row <- data.frame(lyrics = longest_lyrics,
                      song = "Drip too Hard",
                      artist = "Gunna and Lil Baby"
                      )



longest_lyrics_df <- rbind(longest_lyrics_df, new_row)

```

```{r}

# A milli 
url <- "https://www.shazam.com/song/1490348552/breaking-me"


page <- read_html(url)


lyrics_div <- page %>%
  html_elements(".Text-module_text-gray-900__Qcj0F") %>%
  html_text()
x <- as.data.frame(lyrics_div)

max_length_index <- which.max(nchar(x$lyrics_div))


longest_lyrics <- x[max_length_index, "lyrics_div"]



new_row <- data.frame(lyrics = longest_lyrics,
                      song = "Breaking Me",
                      artist = "Topic , A7S"
                      )



longest_lyrics_df <- rbind(longest_lyrics_df, new_row)
```




```{r}
write.csv(longest_lyrics_df,"Data", row.names = TRUE)
```




































































































```{r}
library(word2vec)
```


```{r}
model <- word2vec::word2vec(x = tolower(longest_lyrics_df$lyrics), 
                  type="cbow",# continuous bag of words
                  dim=100, # 100-dim output vectors
                  window = 3L, # window size 3
                  iter = 10L, # train over 10 iterations
                  negative= 10L,# 10 negative samples for each positive sample
                  min_count = 10L) # Drop words less than 10 times
```



```{r}
predict(model, c("breaking"), type = "nearest", top_n = 10)
```
